results.title: Impact of lisinopril and atenolol on kidney function in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Impact of @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on kidney function in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@hypertensive NIDDM@@@ subjects with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

results.title: Differential effects of enalapril and atenolol on proteinuria and renal haemodynamics in non-diabetic renal disease.
results.text_hl: Differential effects of @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and renal haemodynamics in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@non-diabetic renal disease@@@.

results.title: Captopril and atenolol are equally effective in retarding progression of diabetic nephropathy. Results of a 2-year prospective, randomized study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@Captopril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ are equally effective in retarding progression of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Elving LD, Wetzels JF, van Lier HJ, de Nobel E, Berden JH. Captopril and atenolol are equally effective in retarding progression of diabetic nephropathy. Results of a 2-year prospective, randomized study. Diabetologia. 1994 Jun;37(6):604-9. PMID: 7926346

results.title: Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: We performed a 12-month prospective, randomized, double-blind, parallel study in 43 @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@hypertensive NIDDM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ (21 treated with @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and 22 with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@).

citations.NLM: Nielsen FS, Rossing P, Gall MA, Smidt UM, Chen JW, Sato A, Parving HH. Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy. Scand J Clin Lab Invest. 1997 Aug;57(5):427-34. PMID: 9279969

results.title: Long-term effect of lisinopril and atenolol on kidney function in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.

results.title: Effect of calcium channel or beta-blockade on the progression of diabetic nephropathy in African Americans.
results.text_hl: To examine whether differential effects on @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ affect the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@, we conducted a randomized study that compared the effects of a heart rate-lowering calcium channel blocker, sustained-release @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@, with those of a beta-blocker, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, on the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic renal disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Bakris GL, Mangrum A, Copley JB, Vicknair N, Sadler R. Effect of calcium channel or beta-blockade on the progression of diabetic nephropathy in African Americans. Hypertension. 1997 Mar;29(3):744-50. PMID: 9052890

results.title: Long-term treatment with nebivolol attenuates renal damage in Zucker diabetic fatty rats.
results.text_hl: Accordingly, this study evaluated the renal effects of @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@, a third-generation beta-blocker with additional vasodilating activity, versus those of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in an animal model of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Toblli JE, Cao G, Giani JF, Muñoz MC, Angerosa M, Dominici FP. Long-term treatment with nebivolol attenuates renal damage in Zucker diabetic fatty rats. J Hypertens. 2011 Aug;29(8):1613-23. PMID: 21720265

results.title: Association between angiotensin-converting-enzyme gene polymorphism and failure of renoprotective therapy.
results.text_hl: METHODS: 81 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with non-@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic renal disease@@@ had been entered into a randomised comparison of oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ to prevent progressive @DISEASE_Cognitive_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D060825 @@@decline in renal function@@@.

citations.NLM: van Essen GG, Rensma PL, de Zeeuw D, Sluiter WJ, Scheffer H, Apperloo AJ, de Jong PE. Association between angiotensin-converting-enzyme gene polymorphism and failure of renoprotective therapy. Lancet. 1996 Jan 13;347(8994):94-5. PMID: 8538349
